result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Yesenia L and her children.

207 PM
Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State. Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Eric Olson. Clerk JT  Minutes: Case was assigned to Br.3 .  A new tab has been pulled and the case is now assigned to Br.1  pursuant to court rule. Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 09:15 am. Signature bond reinstated.
Per phone conversation with Janell case is being tabbed to a criminal judge per the judicial rotation as no prelim has been held yet.
tab pulled due to judicial rotation.
DE in custody and appearing today at 1pm Intake.

Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney J. Eric Olson in court on behalf of Defendant Kenneth D Anderson who is currently in Lake Co. Jail.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes: Arguments made and the court takes no action on Atty Olson's motion to reinstate prior bond and vacate the warrant.  Status Conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Correspondence received from Atty Olson requesting a quick hearing before DE's extradition hearing.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State. Attorney J. Eric Olson in court with Kenneth D Anderson who appears in custody by video via Zoom from Lake Co.  Clerk: PU. 
  DE was extradited to Lake Co Illinois and DE is requesting the body only warrant be canceled and his signature bond be reinstated. Upon hearing arguments motion is denied.  Court sets a status conf. pending outcome in Lake Co. Illinois.  Bond only warrant continues.  Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Motion hearing on October 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
